ygData.subject: Havoc...
ygData.msgSnippet: Burning Hammer looked around to make sure nobody was there, then he stepped out of his hiding place. He looked to the floor and seen Havoc, decapitated.

Burning Hammer looked around to make sure nobody was there, then he stepped
out of his hiding place. He looked to the floor and seen Havoc, decapitated.

Burning Hammer: Oh, man, somebody didn't like you.

Burning Hammer grabbed a hold of Havoc and put him over one shoulder. He
decided to go put him in a CR Tank. Burning Hammer walked to the CR room and
put Havoc in a CR Tank. He watched Havoc's status...
